title: My Little Poplar - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Aggressive Characters   Black Belly   Bullying   Character Growth   Coming of Age   Complex Family Relationships   Devoted Love Interests   Enemies Become Lovers   Family Business   Firearms   F*llatio   Handsome Male Lead   Military   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   R*pe   Strong Love Interests   Torture   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Shui Qian Cheng   水千丞
description:
A good-for-nothing, blockheaded rich young master was thrown into the military by his family to teach him a lesson. In this rural, lousy place where nothing was accessible, Young Master Bai called for help in vain, and was forced to accept his fate tearfully. Enduring tough training as well as the daily bruising of his pride was already torturous enough for him, so why did he have to meet a jinx that was always giving him trouble and always coveted his butt? This jinx looked decent and proper on the outside, but was filled with wickedness. Young Master Bai would never surrender to him!

The novel is a story about a weakling of a little willow who, through the military, was guided into becoming a valiant and heroic little poplar. Watch how Young Master Bai takes one step after another to grow into an acceptable soldier of the republic!!>
